characterDescription: Droz was the helmsman of the ship, First Dreams.

characterDetails.Appearance: He was a lanky man with dark brown eyes and skin.
characterDetails.History:
Droz helmed the ship that was captained by Vazrmeb, who hired Kaza to help him navigate to Akinah.
The First Dreams was compromised by the on-ship cook, who poisoned all aboard just offshore of the island in an attempt to prevent them from reaching it. She was responsible for the death of Droz.
